mapper.select: select count(*) from member where u_idx = #{u_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into member (u_idx, nickname, github_url, profilephoto) values (#{u_idx}, #{nickname}, #{github_url}, #{profilephoto})
insert into user_detail (u_idx, company, bio, email, location, blog) values (#{u_idx}, #{company}, #{bio}, #{email}, #{location}, #{blog})
